description: Tracks Evaluation and Management (EM) code calculations based on LOS codes. EM codes are used by physicians to report and bill medical services depending on medical history, physical examinations and the level of medical decision making. This table also tracks the source of EM codes - if they were entered manually or via documentation.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the EM code associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EM_CODE_SECTION
columns.description: The section of the patient's chart used to calculate the EM code. Ex: Review of Systems (ROS) or History of Present Illness (HPI)

columns.name: EM_CODE_ATTRIBUTE
columns.description: The attribute of the section of the chart used to calculate the EM code. Ex: A Neuro or GI section in the Review of Systems (ROS)

columns.name: EMCODE_ASSO_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the note record ID corresponding to the note where this EM code was filed.

columns.name: EMCODE_SDI
columns.description: This item stores the source SmartData Element Identifier (discrete piece of data) for the current line of EM code.

columns.name: EM_CODE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks if a particular EM Code was filed manually (not automatically via documentation) and which manual source filed this code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


LOS Tree

columns.name: EM_CODE
columns.description: The EM code value used to calculate level of service
